tool.name: Azure Video Indexer
tool.description: Azure Video Indexer providing video index results needed by other Azure video tools such as Azure Video OCR and Azure Shot Detection.

param.name: input_video
param.label: Input Video
param.help: An input video file for Azure Video Indexer

param.name: include_ocr
param.label: Include Video OCR Artifact
param.help: A boolean value indicating whether to include video OCR artifact in the outputs

param.name: include_shot
param.label: Include Shot Detection Artifact
param.help: A boolean value indicating whether to include shot detection artifact in the outputs

param.name: location
param.label: Azure Location
param.help: Region video indexer account is running in Azure

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
Upload video to Azure, run the Video Indexer, and outputs the video index JSON as well as any additional artifacts JSON requested.
